blade-of-dawn.name: Blade of Dawn
blade-of-dawn.description: Summon a sword of condensed light into your hands. The blade hums with radiant energy, eager to strike. Summons light sword. Melee attacks deal 2D12. Uses caster's MIT + AST for attack rolls. Lasts until dismissed or rest.
blade-of-dawn.notes: Summoned melee light weapon. Attack rolls use MIT + AST.

searing-ray.name: Searing Ray
searing-ray.description: Focus light through your fingertips into a concentrated beam that burns through flesh and armor alike.

luminous-edge.name: Luminous Edge

special: Enchant weapon: +3D8 damage on all damage rolls

luminous-edge.description: Infuse an existing weapon with radiant energy. Light traces along its edge, hungry for impact. Enchant weapon: +3D8 damage on all damage rolls. Duration: 3 rounds.

lance-of-radiance.name: Lance of Radiance
lance-of-radiance.description: Conjure a spear of pure sunlight. It returns to your hand after each throw, trailing golden fire. Summons light spear. Ranged attacks deal 3D10, returns after throw. Uses SPD + AST for attack rolls. Lasts until dismissed or rest.
lance-of-radiance.notes: Summoned returning ranged light weapon. Attack rolls use SPD + AST.

empowered-strike.name: Empowered Strike

special: Next attack within 1 minute deals double damage dice
Works with light weapons or enchanted weapons

empowered-strike.description: Channel concentrated light into your next attack. The blow lands with the weight of the sun behind it. Next attack within 1 minute deals double damage dice. Works with light weapons or enchanted weapons.

solar-arsenal.name: Solar Arsenal

creature.name: Light Daggers (3)
creature.notes: 3 daggers orbit the caster. Each can attack independently for 1 AP. Range 30 ft.

solar-arsenal.description: Summon multiple weapons of light that orbit around you, striking at enemies who draw near. Summons 3 light daggers that orbit caster. Each dagger can attack for 2D8. Daggers use AST for attack rolls. 1 AP per dagger attack. Lasts until destroyed or rest.

radiant-fury.name: Radiant Fury

special: Target ally's weapon attacks deal +2D12 radiant damage
Inflict Blinded on critical hits

radiant-fury.description: Empower an ally's weapon with blinding radiance. Their strikes burn with holy vengeance. Target ally's weapon attacks deal +2D12 radiant damage and inflict Blinded on critical hits. Duration: 3 rounds.
radiant-fury.notes: Strong ally weapon buff with blind on crit

corona-strike.name: Corona Strike

special: All enemies within 15 ft. of target take 3D10 radiant damage

corona-strike.description: Become a vessel of pure light. Your entire body blazes as you deliver a devastating blow that echoes across the battlefield. 6D12 + MIT + AST Modifier. All enemies within 15 ft. of target take 3D10 radiant damage. Enemies struck are Blinded for 1 round. Range: Melee.

shield-of-light.name: Shield of Light
shield-of-light.description: Raise your hand and weave a barrier of solid radiance before you. Attacks splash harmlessly against its gleaming surface. Target gains +2 D20 on defensive rolls. Duration: 2 rounds. Range: Self or touch.

absorb-radiance.name: Absorb Radiance

special: Heal HP equal to half the amount reduced

absorb-radiance.description: Draw incoming energy into yourself, converting hostile magic into sustaining light. Reduce magic damage taken by 2D10. Caster heals for half the amount absorbed.

guardians-glow.name: Guardian's Glow

special: First attack against caster each combat deals -1D10 damage

guardians-glow.description: A soft aura surrounds you, warning of incoming danger and hardening against the first strike. Caster cannot be surprised. First attack against caster each combat deals -1D10 damage. Duration: 1 hour.

bulwark-of-dawn.name: Bulwark of Dawn

special: Create a 10 ft. wide barrier
Enemies attacking through it suffer 2D8 radiant damage

bulwark-of-dawn.description: Erect a wall of crystallized light. Those who strike it find their weapons burning in their hands. Create a 10 ft. wide barrier. Enemies attacking through it suffer 2D8 radiant damage. Duration: 3 rounds.

interpose.name: Interpose

special: Become the target instead

interpose.description: Step between an ally and harm, wreathing yourself in protective light as you take the blow meant for them. When an adjacent ally is attacked, become the target instead. Damage taken is reduced by 2D12.

aegis-of-the-sun.name: Aegis of the Sun

special: Attackers within 5 ft. take 1D8 radiant damage

aegis-of-the-sun.description: The light itself becomes your armor. Radiance wraps around you in layers, each one waiting to shatter before harm reaches flesh. Caster gains 50 temporary HP that absorbs damage before real HP. While active, attackers within 5 ft. take 1D8 radiant damage. Duration: Until depleted or 10 minutes.

sanctuary-of-radiance.name: Sanctuary of Radiance

special: All allies inside gain +3 D20 on defensive rolls
All allies inside gain resistance to all damage (damage halved)
Enemies cannot enter

sanctuary-of-radiance.description: Call forth a dome of pure light that shields all within. Inside its boundaries, harm cannot find purchase. Create a 20 ft. radius dome centered on caster. All allies inside gain +3 D20 on defensive rolls and resistance to all damage (damage halved). Enemies cannot enter. Duration: 3 rounds. The caster cannot move.

cleansing-light.name: Cleansing Light
cleansing-light.description: Wash an ally in gentle radiance that burns away afflictions while leaving flesh untouched. Remove one curse, poison, or disease from the target. Range: Touch.

mending-glow.name: Mending Glow
mending-glow.description: The softest light carries the greatest healing. Minor wounds close beneath its warm touch. Target heals 2D8 HP. Range: Touch.

purifying-beam.name: Purifying Beam
purifying-beam.description: A lance of sanctified light that sears corruption and undead with particular ferocity. 2D10 + AST Modifier. Deals +1D10 against undead or corrupted targets. Range: 30 ft.

dispel-darkness.name: Dispel Darkness

special: End one magical darkness effect or shadow-based ability in area
Void magic users in the area suffer damage

dispel-darkness.description: Drive back unnatural shadows and the magic that spawned them. Light floods spaces that darkness has claimed. End one magical darkness effect or shadow-based ability in 30 ft. radius. Void magic users in the area suffer 2D8 radiant damage.

restore-clarity.name: Restore Clarity
restore-clarity.description: Burn away mental contamination with focused radiance. Minds trapped in darkness find their way back to light. Remove Confused, Charmed, Terrified, or similar mental conditions from target. Range: 30 ft.

cascade-of-purity.name: Cascade of Purity

special: All allies within 20 ft. are cleansed of one negative condition each
Each ally heals 2D10 HP

cascade-of-purity.description: Light pours outward in a wave, touching all allies and scouring impurities from their bodies and spirits. All allies within 20 ft. are cleansed of one negative condition each and heal 2D10 HP.

searing-judgment.name: Searing Judgment
searing-judgment.description: Concentrate the righteous fury of pure light into a devastating ray that leaves only ash where corruption stood. 4D12 + AST Modifier. Deals +2D12 against undead, demons, or corrupted targets. Target gains Burned condition (1 stack). Range: 40 ft.

radiant-absolution.name: Radiant Absolution

special: All enemies in 25 ft. radius take damage
Undead and corrupted must make COR check (Difficulty 45) or be destroyed instantly
All negative conditions on allies in the area are removed
Allies heal 3D10 HP

radiant-absolution.description: Call down a pillar of absolute light that purges all darkness from an area. Nothing impure survives its touch. All enemies in 25 ft. radius take 5D10 radiant damage. All negative conditions on allies in the area are removed. Undead and corrupted enemies take +3D10 damage and must make COR check (Difficulty 45) or be destroyed instantly. Allies heal 3D10 HP.
radiant-absolution.notes: Mass cleanse and devastating anti-undead strike
